thread.title: Volkswagen Set for Revamp Under New CEO

author: William Boston
title: Volkswagen Set for Revamp Under New CEO
text:
BERLIN—Volkswagen AG’s board is expected to appoint Herbert Diess, the chief of the company’s namesake brand, as its new chief executive later Thursday, paving the way for him to push through a broad reorganization of the company, according to people familiar with the matter.

The new CEO, and his reorganization plan, could herald the rollback of some of the steps current Chief Executive Matthias Müller had taken in reaction to the diesel-emissions scandal that hit the company nearly three years ago. On Thursday, the supervisory...
